title: Correction to: Dual Regulation of the Arabidopsis High-Affinity Root Iron Uptake System by Local and Long-Distance Signals
content: This is a correction to: Grégory A. Vert, Jean-François Briat, Catherine Curie, Dual Regulation of the Arabidopsis High-Affinity Root Iron Uptake System by Local and Long-Distance Signals, Plant Physiology, Volume 132, Issue 2, June 2003, Pages 796–804, https://doi.org/10.1104/pp.102.016089
